Read Time Estimator: Your Personal Reading Companion

Instantly know how long it will take to read any article or web page. This handy extension:

• Calculates and displays estimated reading time for web content
• Allows you to save articles for later reading
• Tracks your reading progress across saved articles
• Customizable reading speed to personalize estimates
• Works seamlessly on most news sites and blogs

Perfect for busy professionals, students, or anyone who wants to manage their online reading time more effectively. Plan your reading sessions, prioritize content, and never be caught off-guard by unexpectedly long articles again.

Simple, unobtrusive, and incredibly useful - Read Time Estimator helps you make the most of your valuable time online.
